shaderCode: vec2 uv=(FC.xy*2.-r.xy)/r.y;uv*=slider_zoom;uv.x+=slider_panX;uv.y+=slider_panY;vec3 col=vec3(.02,.05,.1);vec2 p=uv;float river=.1*sin(p.x*4.5)+.05*sin(p.x*10.2)+.02*sin(p.x*25.);float north=p.y-(.35+river);float south=-.45-p.y;float west=-1.7-(p.x+p.y*.4);float east=p.x-(1.5-p.y*.6);float d=max(max(north,south),max(west,east));float border=smoothstep(.02,.0,abs(d));float glow=exp(-8.*max(0.,d));float inside=1.-smoothstep(0.,.01,d);if(inside>0.){float gridScale=slider_networkDensity;vec2 gv=fract(p*gridScale)-.5;vec2 id=floor(p*gridScale);float distToNode=length(gv);float node=smoothstep(.15,.05,distToNode);float pulse=sin(t*slider_pulseSpeed+id.x*.5+id.y*.8);pulse=smoothstep(.8,1.,pulse);float lines=(smoothstep(.45,.5,1.-abs(gv.x))+smoothstep(.45,.5,1.-abs(gv.y)))*.2;vec3 mapCol=vec3(0.,.15,.3);vec3 nodeCol=vec3(0.,.8,1.);vec3 pulseCol=vec3(1.,.9,.2);col=mix(col,mapCol,.8)+lines*vec3(0.,.6,1.)+node*nodeCol+node*pulse*pulseCol*2.;}col+=vec3(0.,.7,1.)*border*1.5;col+=vec3(0.,.3,.8)*glow*.6;col*=1.-length(uv*.4);o=vec4(col,1.);
